rev.diff:
Line 22: Line 22:
*[[Hunter S. Thompson]] - Following the demise of Eriksen's coffee pot, it was blown out of a cannon, while Eriksen was wearing a t-shirt that read [[Gonzo journalism|gonzo]], mimicking Hunter S. Thompson's burial.
*[[Hunter S. Thompson]] - Following the demise of Eriksen's coffee pot, it was blown out of a cannon, while Eriksen was wearing a t-shirt that read [[Gonzo journalism|gonzo]], mimicking Hunter S. Thompson's burial.
*[[Linkin Park]] and [[Fred Durst]] - He has, both in strips and in a national newspaper interview stated that he would rather have his pubic hairs individually removed than listen to Linkin Park. Eriksen himself looks quite similar to Fred Durst, exploited in some strips
*[[Linkin Park]] and [[Fred Durst]] - He has, both in strips and in a national newspaper interview stated that he would rather have his pubic hairs individually removed than listen to Linkin Park. Eriksen himself looks quite similar to Fred Durst, exploited in some strips
â
*[[Linux]] - In one strip, Mads' brother (a computer-[[Oracle|oracle]]) offers advice on how to get rid of [[Trojan horse (computing)|trojans]], [[malware]], etc, always concluding with "install Linux". At one point a reader asks which Linux distribution he should use, at which point Mads' brother replies: "[[Gentoo Linux|Gentoo]] for you, [[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu]] for grandma, HA-HA-HA!!!" In a current ongoing series, Mads has gotten rid of windows and tries to install Linux, but gets help from "Linux Man", A.K.A. his brother.
+
*[[Linux]] - In one strip, Mads' brother (a computer-[[Oracle|oracle]]) offers advice on how to get rid of [[Trojan horse (computing)|trojans]], [[malware]], etc, always concluding with "install Linux". At one point a reader asks which Linux distribution he should use, at which point Mads' brother replies: "[[Gentoo Linux|Gentoo]] for you, [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] for grandma, HA-HA-HA!!!" In a current ongoing series, Mads has gotten rid of windows and tries to install Linux, but gets help from "Linux Man", A.K.A. his brother.
*''[[LOST]]'' -There has been one reference to the TV-series LOST
*''[[LOST]]'' -There has been one reference to the TV-series LOST
*''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' - The Madam is especially fond of [[Viggo Mortensen]] and [[Aragorn]].
*''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' - The Madam is especially fond of [[Viggo Mortensen]] and [[Aragorn]].
